TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VirtualHubResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a VirtualHub along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetVirtualHubResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetVirtualHub method.
